title: Full-Stack E-Commerce Platform
desc:
A fully functional e-commerce website developed from scratch to meet real business requirements. This is a real commercial project where I was responsible for the entire process — from the initial idea and UI/UX design to full technical implementation, automation, and integrations.

The website is built on Creatium, but due to platform limitations, most of the core functionality was implemented using custom JavaScript, Make (Integromat), and a custom Google Sheets database. The system is designed to be scalable, automated, and easy to manage for non-technical users.

I designed the entire website UI/UX from scratch, without templates: page structure, user flows, product cards, product gallery slider, animations, and interactive elements. All design and user experience decisions were created and implemented by me.

Key features implemented:

• Full product catalog with categories and subcategories
• Custom product cards built from scratch
• Product gallery slider
• Favorites system, implemented via Make automation
• Custom shopping cart with an extended checkout form (name, email, phone, delivery method, delivery address)
• Minimum order amount — 3000 RUB
• Dynamic discount system (from 10k / 50k / 100k RUB), implemented via custom JavaScript
• Product quantity limits in cart (users cannot order more than available stock)
• Advanced multi-word search (Creatium supports only single-word search — fully rewritten)
• User registration and authentication
• Automatic stock management: when a product is purchased, stock is updated in Google Sheets and instantly reflected on the website
• Database with 150+ pages in Google Sheets using formulas and structured logic
• Robokassa payment integration
• Order notifications via custom Telegram bot (created from scratch)
• Email notifications via Make
• Custom cookie consent system
• Pop-ups and system notifications
• Full automation of orders and inventory management

This project is a real, production-ready e-commerce solution, actively used by a real business.

title: Business landing
desc:
A high-performance business landing page developed from scratch for a single service-based company. During the development process, a scalable architecture was intentionally designed, allowing the company to expand the website and create new service-specific landing pages based on a single core solution (one template → dozens of targeted landing pages).

The website is built using pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript without heavy frameworks. The architecture allows fast duplication and adaptation of pages for new service directions while maintaining a consistent visual style, high loading speed, and strong SEO optimization.

The entire layout and structure were custom-built without templates. The website is fully responsive and adapted for all devices, using modern CSS Grid and Flexbox techniques.

Key features and optimizations implemented:

• Fully custom layout without templates
• Responsive layout using CSS Grid and Flexbox
• Full adaptation for desktop, tablet, and mobile devices
• Ultra performance optimization (Google PageSpeed: 100 / 95 — Desktop / Mobile)
• Image optimization
• Font optimization
• Minimized and optimized JavaScript and CSS
• Scalable structure for rapid expansion with new company services

Implemented JavaScript functionality:

• Responsive services slider using Swiper.js with custom breakpoints
• Modal windows and galleries using Fancybox
• Lazy-loaded Yandex Map implemented via IntersectionObserver
• Interactive FAQ accordion with dynamic content height control
• Floating Telegram button with advanced scroll-based behavior:
  - appears after a defined scroll position
  - automatically shifts when approaching the footer
  - attaches to the contacts section on mobile devices
• Complete UI behavior logic based on scroll position and viewport size

This project is built for a real business, focusing on high conversion rates, maximum performance, and convenient long-term scalability without rewriting existing code.
